description: Aubade Bahia balconette bra in pale pink

core:description.text: The iconic Aubade Bahia balconette bra rendered in a whisper of pale pink. Embroidered eyelet lace frames the cups while satin ribbon lacing punctuates the center gore, lifting and shaping with Parisian allure. Adjustable straps and a smooth microfiber back keep the romantic look comfortable beneath sheer blouses and evening silk.
